title: Intro to Python Workshop
desc: A beginner-friendly workshop covering the fundamentals of the Python programming language.

title: Web Accessibility Best Practices
desc: Learn how to make your websites usable for everyone, covering ARIA labels and keyboard navigation.

title: BattleBots Information Session
desc: Join us to learn about building our next combat robot for the national competition.

title: Figma for Beginners
desc: Get hands-on experience with the industry-standard tool for interface design and prototyping.

title: Guest Lecture: The Future of AI
desc: Special guest Dr. Aris Thorne discusses the latest trends in generative AI and large language models.

title: Capture The Flag (CTF) Kick-off
desc: Team up and test your skills in our first ethical hacking competition of the semester.

title: Global Game Jam Planning
desc: Brainstorm ideas and form teams for the upcoming 48-hour Global Game Jam event.

title: Startup Pitch Night
desc: Present your business idea to a panel of local investors and entrepreneurs for feedback and prizes.

title: Golden Hour Photo Walk
desc: Join us for a relaxing walk around campus to capture beautiful shots during the golden hour.

title: Impromptu Speaking Workshop
desc: Improve your ability to think on your feet and deliver compelling arguments with minimal preparation.
